title: Clash of Clans and Clash Royale mobile revenue 2018
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Game, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Game on the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Game Clash Royale and lowest at Game Clash of Clans.
The difference of Revenue in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Game is 30.0.
